Detailed Description

Contains all interaction related to users.

Author:
Ryan LeFevre

Member Function Documentation

OsimoUser ( $  id = false,
$  is_viewer = true 
)

Class constructor.

Parameters:
mixed $id (optional) If false, the system tries to load the user from session variables. Otherwise, the system will load the user with the ID specified.
boolean $is_viewer (optional) Is the user this class is loading the actual user that is browsing the forum?
